dataView.label: 公告信息管理
dataView.afterLoadEventScript: %24(%22%23aws_grid_obj_23824c488fec4e7aad0fea06161a9f2f%22).awsGrid(%7B%0A load%3A function(event%2C ui) %7B%0A %2F%2Fconsole.log(event)%3B%0A %2F%2Fconsole.log(ui)%3B%0A var data %3D ui.dataModel.data%2C%0A datal %3D data.length%2C%0A ids %3D %22%22%2C%0A sid %3D %24(%22%23sid%22).val()%3B%0A for (var i %3D 0%3B i %3C datal%3B i%2B%2B) %7B%0A ids %2B%3D data%5Bi%5D._ID %2B %22%2C%22%3B%0A %7D%0A if (ids.length %3E 0) %7B%0A %09ids %3D ids.substring(0%2Cids.length-1)%3B%0A %24.post(%22.%2Fjd%22%2C %7B%0A sid%3A sid%2C%0A cmd%3A %22com.awspaas.user.apps.devcase_notice_BRecords%22%2C%0A ids%3A ids%2C%0A %7D%2C%0A function(data) %7B%0A if (data.result %3D%3D %22ok%22) %7B%0A%0A %7D else %7B%0A console.log(data.msg)%3B%0A %7D%0A %7D)%3B%0A %7D%0A %7D%0A%7D)%3B

userextendbutton.label: 发布
userextendbutton.eventscript: function publish()%7B%0A var rows %3D getGridSelectedRows()%2C%0A ids %3D %22%22%2C%0A sid %3D %24(%22%23sid%22).val()%3B%0A for (var i %3D 0%3B i %3C rows.length%3B i%2B%2B) %7B%0A %2F%2F alert('%u884C%u7D22%u5F15%uFF1A'%2Brows%5Bi%5D.rowIndx%2B'****%u5F53%u524D%u9875%u7D22%u5F15%uFF1A'%2Brows%5Bi%5D.rowPageIndx%2B'****%u540D%u79F0%uFF1A'%2BgetGridFieldValue(rows%5Bi%5D.rowData%2C'NAME'))%3B %2F%2F %u65B9%u6CD5getGridFieldValue()%u6839%u636E%u5355%u884Cjson%u6570%u636E%u548C%u5217%u540D%u7D22%u5F15%u83B7%u53D6%u76F8%u5E94%u7684%u6570%u636E%u503C%0A ids %2B%3D getGridFieldValue(rows%5Bi%5D.rowData%2C '_ID') %2B %22%2C%22%3B%0A %7D%0A if (ids.length %3E 0) %7B%0A %24.post(%22.%2Fjd%22%2C %7B%0A sid%3A sid%2C%0A cmd%3A %22com.awspaas.user.apps.devcase_notice_release%22%2C%0A ids%3A ids%2C%0A %7D%2C%0A function (data) %7B%0A if (data.result %3D%3D %22ok%22) %7B%0A alert(%22%u53D1%u5E03%u6210%u529F%22)%3B%0A %7D else %7B%0A alert(%22%u53D1%u5E03%u5931%u8D25%22)%3B%0A console.log(data.msg)%3B%0A %7D%0A %7D)%3B%0A %7D%0A%7D

userextendbutton.label: 关闭
userextendbutton.eventscript: function closeNotice()%7B%0A var rows %3D getGridSelectedRows()%2C%0A ids %3D %22%22%2C%0A sid %3D %24(%22%23sid%22).val()%3B%0A for (var i %3D 0%3B i %3C rows.length%3B i%2B%2B) %7B%0A %2F%2F alert('%u884C%u7D22%u5F15%uFF1A'%2Brows%5Bi%5D.rowIndx%2B'****%u5F53%u524D%u9875%u7D22%u5F15%uFF1A'%2Brows%5Bi%5D.rowPageIndx%2B'****%u540D%u79F0%uFF1A'%2BgetGridFieldValue(rows%5Bi%5D.rowData%2C'NAME'))%3B %2F%2F %u65B9%u6CD5getGridFieldValue()%u6839%u636E%u5355%u884Cjson%u6570%u636E%u548C%u5217%u540D%u7D22%u5F15%u83B7%u53D6%u76F8%u5E94%u7684%u6570%u636E%u503C%0A ids %2B%3D getGridFieldValue(rows%5Bi%5D.rowData%2C '_ID') %2B %22%2C%22%3B%0A %7D%0A if (ids.length %3E 0) %7B%0A %24.post(%22.%2Fjd%22%2C %7B%0A sid%3A sid%2C%0A cmd%3A %22com.awspaas.user.apps.devcase_notice_close%22%2C%0A ids%3A ids%2C%0A %7D%2C%0A function (data) %7B%0A if (data.result %3D%3D %22ok%22) %7B%0A alert(%22%u5173%u95ED%u6210%u529F%22)%3B%0A %7D else %7B%0A alert(%22%u5173%u95ED%u5931%u8D25%22)%3B%0A console.log(data.msg)%3B%0A %7D%0A %7D)%3B%0A %7D%0A%7D
